short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A countdown to your calendar events

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension lets you track days/hours/minutes of your calendar events.
The nearest event time would always be visible in your chrome toolbar.
Helps you track date-time until your important calendar event even when you are mindlessly browsing
This also syncs between browsers. Like if you login to same chrome account on two different PCs, it'll show the same results!
